labels.emailMissing: Please enter a valid email address
labels.emailPasswordBottom:
If you did not request to have your password reset, you can safely ignore this email. Rest assured your customer account is safe.

If clicking the link doesn't seem to work, you can copy and paste the link into your browser's address window or retype it there. Once you have returned to the site, we will give instructions for resetting your password.

We will never e-mail you and ask you to disclose or verify your password, credit card, or banking account number. If you receive a suspicious e-mail with a link to update your account information, do not click on the link. Instead, report the e-mail to us for investigation. Thanks for visiting!
labels.emailPasswordTop:
We received a request to reset the password associated with this e-mail address. If you made this request, please follow the instructions below.

Click the link below to reset your password using our secure server:
labels.enterOtherComments: Please enter a comment explaining the reason for this return.

labels.orderConfirmationBlob1: Thank you for shopping with us. We'd like to let you know that we have received your order and are preparing it for shipment.
labels.orderShipmentBlob1: Thank you for shopping with us. We thought you'd like to know that we shipped items from your order, and your order can no longer be changed. If you need to return an item from this shipment or manage other orders, please visit My Account.
labels.orderShipmentBlob2: Your order might ship in multiple packages. The number above is your primary tracking number. For more information, click here to log into your account.
labels.orderShipmentComplete: Thank you for shopping with us. We thought you'd like to know that we shipped your items, and that this completes your order. Your order is on its way and can no longer be changed. If you need to return an item from this shipment or manage other orders, please visit My Account.

labels.confirmationText: Thank you for your order! You will receive an email confirmation.
labels.inStockBlob1: Thank you for shopping at {0}! We have good news for you-- we now have the following item(s) in stock:
labels.inStockBlob2: TO ADD THE ITEMS TO YOUR CART: CLICK HERE.
labels.returnApprovedBlob1: Thank you for shopping at {0}. Your request to return the following item(s) has been accepted.
labels.returnApprovedBlob2:
To return your online purchase:

  1. Pack your return in the original shipping package, if possible.
  2. Include the attached packing slip and return label, and indicate the reason for the return.
  3. Include all original packing materials and accessories.
  4. Send your return to:
labels.returnApprovedBlob3: You will receive another email when we receive the returned item(s).
labels.returnRejectedBlob1: Thank you for shopping at {0}. We regret to inform you that your request to return the following item(s) has been rejected:
labels.returnRejectedBlob2: If you would like more information about our return and exchange policy, please visit our Return & Exchange Policy page.
labels.returnReceivedBlob1: Thank you for shopping at {0}. We wanted to let you know that we have received the following returned items:
labels.returnReceivedBlob2: You will receive another email when we have processed your return.
labels.returnOtherBlob1: Thank you for shopping at {0}. We wanted to let you know that your return status is now {1}.
labels.returnOtherBlob2: You will receive another email when we have processed your return.
labels.returnClosedBlob1: Please be informed that we have completed processing your refund request. You will receive your refund within 3-5?? business days using the original payment method used when the purchase was placed.
labels.returnClosedBlob2: If you require any additional assistance, please feel free to contact customer service
labels.newUserEmailNotification: Your customer account has been created and you can log in anytime at http://{0}/ as {1}.
labels.digitalCreditApplied: You have applied the following gift card or store credit payments to your order:
labels.giftCardEmailIntro: Thank you for purchasing a {0} Gift Card. Do not delete this message -- to redeem the gift card you must use the gift card claim code below. You may want to print a copy of this message for easy reference later.
labels.giftCardEmailInstructions:
Follow these steps to redeem the gift card:
  • Visit {0}
  • Enter the Claim Code when prompted during checkout.
  • Gift card funds will then be applied automatically to orders.
    NOTE: if you have an account, the remaining funds will be added to your account. If you do not have an account, you will need to use the claim code again to use the remaining funds on any future purchases.
  • You must pay for any remaining balance on your order with another payment method.
labels.giftCardEmailClosing:
If you have questions about redeeming your gift card, please visit {0}

Sincerely,

Customer Service

product.name: Pair of Dual 15" PA Speakers, 2 18" Subs, 2 15" Monitors, 2 Amplifiers, and Cables
product.description:
Package Number: SA-155TPKG9
Pair of Dual 15" PA Speakers
Pair of 18" Sub Woofer Cabs
Pair of 15" Wedge Style Monitors
Two Power Amplifiers
Four 35' Speaker Cables (12 Gauge)
Two 25' Speaker Cables (12 Gauge)
